text: How can I use the  `smart_type`  attribute in meta.json to make a custom module smart?
Hi guys. I generate `module` via `hs` in my code, but I can't find the module in Page Edit mode. Can anyone help? pls. Should I register the module somewhere?
Hi, I'd want to add a global menu in a module with  editable rich text editor. Is Possible?
Thanks <@U7SL518D6>! So then if there are multiple instances of these modules on a page, it will only load the script file once?
Yes, files linked to modules or using require, only load those assets once per page. That’s one of the advantages of HubSpot modules.
The same goes for a module’s CSS or JS itself, that only loads if the module is on the page. It also only loads once even if multiple instances of the modules.
